function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of pandemic preparedness plan","Impact":"Increased risk of ineffective response to the COVID-19 pandemic","Mitigation":"Develop and implement a comprehensive pandemic preparedness plan","Technologies":"Crisis management software, emergency response systems","People":"Frontline health and social care workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government health departments"},{"Description":"Inadequate supply of preventive supplies and antiseptics","Impact":"Increased risk of infection transmission in hospitals","Mitigation":"Ensure sufficient stock of preventive supplies and antiseptics, establish a supply chain management system","Technologies":"Inventory management software, supply chain tracking systems","People":"Medical staff, patients","Owner":"Hospital management, procurement and supply chain departments"},{"Description":"Lack of monitoring and surveillance in isolation hospitals","Impact":"Reduced ability to track and control the spread of infections within the hospital","Mitigation":"Install monitoring systems, implement surveillance protocols for healthcare personnel and patients","Technologies":"Camera surveillance systems, RFID tracking systems","People":"Healthcare personnel, patients","Owner":"Hospital management, IT departments"}]}
